address_2: Green Villas Road No. 5 (As per site)
area_comments: As per the copy of sale deed, total built up area comes to 2,100 Sq. Fts comprising Ground Floor 1,050 Sq. Ft and First Floor 1,050 Sq. Ft.
occupancy_comments: Based on available documentation and house tax receipts in the name of the buyer, the property is self-occupied.
construction_comments: As per sale deed and site inspection, the property is fully constructed with RCC roof and brick walls.
market_value_definition: Market Value is defined as 'an opinion of the best price at which the sale of an interest in property would have been completed unconditionally for cash consideration on the date of the valuation, assuming (1) a willing seller; (2) that, prior to the date of valuation, there had been a reasonable period (having regard to the nature of the property and the state of the market) for the proper marketing of the interest and for the agreement of the sale price; (3) that, the state of the market, level of values and other circumstances were, on any earlier assumed date of exchange of contracts, the same as on the date of valuation; (4) that no account is taken of any additional bid by a prospective buyer with a special interest; (5) that both parties to the transaction had acted knowledgeably, prudently and without compulsion.'
documents_description: Valuation initiation request, sale deed, tax receipt, electricity bill, house plan permission
valuer_comments:
• The subject property is a residential independent house in Ameenpur Village & G.P., Sangareddy District.
• As per the sale deed, the land area is 134 Sq. Yds (1,206 sft) and the total built up area is 2,100 Sq. Ft (Ground Floor: 1,050 Sq. Ft, First Floor: 1,050 Sq. Ft).
• The property is constructed with RCC roof and brick walls, with 3 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, 2 halls, 2 kitchens, and 2 other rooms as per blueprint and site inspection.
• The property is self-occupied by the buyer as per house tax receipts and sale deed.
• Deviation in area is not observed between planned and actual built-up area.
• The surrounding area is residential with good infrastructure and no negative features observed.
• The property is not outside city limits and is located within a developed residential colony (Green Villas).
• For the purpose of this value assessment, it is assumed that the subject property has a clear title and all necessary approvals and permissions have been duly obtained.
valuer_declaration: I confirm that the market value for the subject property as on 24 June 2025 is INR NA/- [N/A] and the value of amenities as on 24 June 2025 is INR NA/- [N/A] taking into consideration the market dynamics and the condition of the property, its location, and amenities available.
disclaimer_text: Please note that the above is a valuation and not a structural survey. CBRE is not responsible to HSBC or the purchaser of the above property for any flaws and/or faults with the property not detected by the above Valuer.
